name: dedwards/statement-section
title: Statement Section
description: Display artist statement with decorative background and signature

paragraph1.default: My work is rooted in a desire to honor the spirit, beauty, and movement found in God's creation. Each sculpture begins with a search for truth—truth in gesture, personality, and emotion.

paragraph2.default: I strive to create bronze pieces that not only represent a subject, but embody its essence. When a viewer feels a spark of connection—a sense of presence, motion, or emotion—I consider the work successful.
